content.rendered:
🎃 Tastebudz Halloween Baddie Box⚰️

Introducing the Tastebudz Halloween Baddie Box, the ultimate limited-edition cannabis seed collection, perfect for the spooky season! This chilling box includes not only premium cannabis seeds but also some ghoulish extras to add to your collection.

👻 What’s Inside:

  • 4 x Cereal Killer Strain Seeds
  • 2 x Camp Crystal Kush Strain Seeds
  • 1 x Glow in the Dark Tastebudz Logo Sticker
  • 1 x Cereal Killer Glitter Sticker
  • 1 x A5 Tastebudz Vamp Sticker

🧛 Cereal Killer (Cereal Milk x OG Kush) – Hybrid

THC: 25% | Yield: 500g/m² | Flowering Time: 8-10 weeks

 

💀 Genetics: A devilish fusion of Cereal Milk and OG Kush, Cereal Killer is a balanced hybrid that merges sweet and earthy flavours for a wickedly good smoke. The sugary, creamy notes of Cereal Milk combine with OG Kush’s piney undertones to create a potent and complex strain.

👀 Effects: This hybrid provides a long-lasting blend of euphoria and body relaxation. Ideal for daytime creativity and evening unwinding, it offers mental clarity and physical ease without full sedation.

👃 Aroma & Flavour: Cereal Killer is packed with a sweet, fruity cereal flavour combined with earthy, citrusy Kush undertones. It’s an aromatic experience that lingers long after your session.

🌟 Bag Appeal: Dense, frosty buds covered in sparkling trichomes, with vivid orange pistils and hints of purple, make this strain as visually appealing as it is potent.

🧪 Resin Quality: Cereal Killer’s thick, sticky resin production makes it ideal for extraction lovers, producing flavorful and potent concentrates.

🎃Strain Benefits: This strain is great for relieving stress, anxiety, and mild aches while offering mental focus and body relaxation.

 

🧟 Camp Crystal Kush (Cereal Killer x Jealousy) – Indica

THC: 30% | Yield: 500g/m² | Flowering Time: 8-10 weeks

 

🪦 Genetics: The sinister pairing of Cereal Killer and Jealousy creates a powerhouse indica strain. Much like the eerie legend of Camp Crystal Lake, this strain sneaks up on you, delivering a deep body high.

🔮 Effects: Starting with a euphoric mental buzz, this strain quickly melts into full-body relaxation, perfect for night-time use. Its calming effects make it great for managing anxiety, insomnia, and chronic pain.

🧟‍♂️ Aroma & Flavour: Camp Crystal Kush blends the creamy sweetness of Cereal Killer with Jealousy’s fruity, gassy notes. The rich flavour combines sweet cream, citrus, and herbal spice, finishing with a pungent Kush exhale.

🕸️ Bag Appeal: Large, dense buds coated in shimmering trichomes and laced with bright purple, green, and orange hues make this strain a visual stunner.

🧛 Resin Quality: The strain’s heavy resin production makes it perfect for extractions, offering flavorful concentrates with complex fruity and gassy profiles.

💤 Strain Benefits: With its deeply sedative effects, Camp Crystal Kush is a go-to for stress relief, chronic pain management, and insomnia.

 

🎃 Bonus Frights:

  • 1 x Glow in the Dark Tastebudz Logo Sticker to light up your collection.
  • 1 x Cereal Killer Glitter Sticker for a flashy tribute to your favourite strain.
  • 1 x A5 Tastebudz Vamp Sticker to give your setup an extra spooky vibe.

Whether you’re looking for the energising creativity of Cereal Killer or the deeply relaxing body high of Camp Crystal Kush, the Halloween Baddie Box has it all—plus some terrifyingly cool extras to keep your grow chilling!

🎃 Halloween Baddie Box ⚰️

  • 4 x Cereal Killer Strain Seeds
  • 2 x Camp Crystal Kush Strain Seeds
  • 1 x Glow in the Dark Tastebudz Logo Sticker
  • 1 x Cereal Killer Glitter Sticker
  • 1 x A5 Tastebudz Vamp Sticker

Get ready for a killer grow with the Tastebudz Halloween Baddie Box! This limited-edition set includes 4 x Cereal Killer seeds (25% THC) and 2 x Camp Crystal Kush seeds (30% THC), delivering both creative euphoria and deep relaxation. Plus, spooky extras like a glow-in-the-dark sticker and exclusive Tastebudz vamp gear make this box a must-have for collectors. Whether you’re after potent effects or standout flavours, this box has everything to elevate your grow. Grab yours before it vanishes!
